entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 9.
